textBox.richText: The quivering lip bubbles above the face of the wave It is ready to leap and crash onto the sifting water, As frail as the lip of the wave looks, The might and strength of the ocean trails not far behind it The wave’s graceful approach is followed by a violent eruption A calm before the storm, But before the wave breaks and crumbles A brief glance of its unique beauty and perfection is allowed. As brief as the moment was, the wave collides with the water below it Upon impact the wave shatters like glass, Beauty reduced to nothing in a matter of a split second Like a gorgeous clay structure smashed into a meaningless blob, The roar of millions of tons of water plowing into each other Reverberates deep into the ocean depths, The explosion is accompanied by a gentle spray of cool crisp mist. This is Yin and Yang the correlation of dualities The Yin, gentle and assiduous creation of a perfect wave Followed by the Yang, violent and belligerent destruction of a wave No good comes of their opposition, But only in harmony together can the two coexist.
